collection.openText: Does such a thing as unconditional love exist?

observe.desc:
[ {After careful observation, He concluded that if he were to become a savior to those who were miserable, they would surely come to love him.
“Will I lose the love I have gained?” “...Yes, most certainly. When you are no longer able to ensure the happiness of others, they will leave you of their own accord and seek a more powerful being.” So the God created a small world where there was only happiness and joy under his control, where all corruption, greed, and the dark parts about human nature would be removed. There was no threat of natural disasters, no disease, no fear of death, and certainly no room for evil human thoughts. He places people who are experiencing despair into the world and becomes the supreme savior of their hearts.
“I’ve gotten rid of the darkness. Now, I can preserve this love, right?”} ]

[ {“It's still too soon. A world too peaceful for too long will eventually crack, and when it does even the youngest of children will think against it, and no one will crave the shelter of such a God in those eons of peace, and the word love will become meaningless.” “But what can I do? I don’t want to cause a disaster...” And so the God continued as he was until the voices grew so loud, he couldn’t ignore them.
So he erased everyone's memories and everything went back to that happy beginning.
“You see, I found a way without causing such pain. I didn't hurt them, I regained their love.” “...how delusional.” ...... You don't care at all. Our wishes, our emotions, our thoughts and memories mean nothing to you. You say you love us but you won't even listen to us, what reason do we have to return your love? ......} ]

[ {“I have saved them from their hell, I have reunited lovers torn apart by life, I have restored life to the sick and afflicted, I have given support to those who crave for knowledge but are poor, I have drawn a perfect end to many grievances, I can't even bear to create any conflict to hurt them. I have done so much, so much for them...” ...... “And they now have a reason to accuse me just because I ignored their little so-called emotions! Such hateful, verminous pests who have turned against the rules of my wonderful world...” ...... “...I have to make sure everyone is happy. I have to make sure the world works. I have to make sure I am loved. Some things will need to be sacrificed, but no world is immune to that. I should have realized that long ago.” ...... Love heals all. Please bathe in pure love and live with me forever and ever!} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0 shall shun those who actively provoke conflict. When an employee completes work on $0 with a good result, the Qliphoth Counter will increase, a love heart will be gained(max of 8), and a layer of shelter will be applied to the department. All Abnormalities and their derivatives within the area of the shelter will have a small reduction to their HP.

$0 will protect everyone in paradise. When the shelter effect is at its strongest, and the employees HP reaches 0, the employee won't die, but their abilities will be drastically reduced and they will be unable to leave the department.
$0 will bring love to all. When an employee in $0's department begins to panic, $0 will use 2 love hearts to restore their SP. After, the Qliphoth Counter will reduce by 1.
...Do you accept my love? If work is not performed on $0 at least once before a Qliphoth Meltdown, the Qliphoth Counter will reduce and a random Abnormality will have its Qliphoth Counter set to 0.

Why aren't you responding? Why don't you love me? When the Qliphoth Counter reaches zero, $0 will change form. At this point, Attachment work will be replaced with appeasement work. During appeasement work, the employee will take 3-6 points of random damage. If the result of appeasement work is good, the Qliphoth Counter will increase. If an employee performs any other type of work, or does not get a good result, they will die.
Love me or die. If $0's Qliphoth Counter is at zero when the day ends, then-
